name: Love and Monsters
description: Seven years after he survived the monster apocalypse, lovably hapless Joel leaves his cozy underground bunker behind on a quest to reunite with his high school sweetheart.

review.author: bbv-69237
review.heading: Better than expected
review.reviewBody: Solid well made movie - very good casting to put Dylan Obrien in this role - he works it perfectly. The rest of the cast is good and the special effects are well done. Solid plot and good action fun film. Worth watching.

keywords: talking to a cow,talking to an animal,posing for a portrait,drawing a portrait,hiding in a bus
